name: Anonymous
comment:
>>986018
Well it will be in sage since that starts at 72 hours, but the thread's nowhere near the 750 post autosage limit, so as long as it stays bumped until Friday and you make sure to announce every session this thread SHOULD (keyword should) be on the first page and good for another 5 days if you're counting from the Friday session.

I suppose it depends on you though. Do you have the time to host 4 more sessions in the next 6-7 days? If not then the thread doesn't matter.
